Ice::

She sniffed something on the wind. She lifted her head and looked 
around. Her shoulder was becoming extremly painful. She winced and 
layed her head back down. She was thinking about how Lunarpine had 
reacted to her. She was certain that he wasn't happy with her new 
form. She sighed and stood up. She smelled that scent again. She 
looked and saw a form coming towards her. She didn't think anything 
of it and kept walking. Leaving a puddle of blood in the snow where 
she had layed down at. Her bandaged was soaked and was falling off. 
She shrugged her shoulder and let out a pained roar. THe bandage fell 
to the ground and she sniffed it. It smelled aweful and acidy. 

She walked on, as the snow fell to the ground a little harder. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Wolf::
> 
> An organic arctic wolf made its way over the cold snow, sniffing 
for 
> food. It had seen an exchanged between two polar bears, but it was 
> not about to attack two of those huge things.
> 
> The wolf stopped, looking at a white form laying on the snow. It 
was 
> one of the polarbears the wolf had seen earlier.
> 
> Creeping closer, the wolf sniffed the air, the smell of blood very 
> prominent. Food....
> 
> THe wolf creeps closer, trying not to make a sound.
>
